price: 14. Allaah baana iska leh Boqortooyada (runta ah ee) samooyinka iyo arlada, wuxuu u denbi dhaafaa qofkuu doono, oo cadaabaa qofkuu doono, Alle waa Denbi Dhaaf Badane, Naxariis Badan.
arabic: وَلِلَّهِ مُلۡكُ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۚ يَغۡفِرُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيُعَذِّبُ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَكَانَ ٱللَّهُ غَفُورٗا رَّحِيمٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walillahi mul'ku al-samāwāti wal-arḍi yaghfiru liman yashāu wayuʿadhibu man yashāu wakāna al-lahu ghafūran raḥīman
